clauses.title: Non-Dominance
clauses.text: No single agent, human, or coordinated node set with less than PLANCK consensus shall hold >5% effective authority across femto/atto validator weight.

enforcement.remedy: auto-rebalance; temporary stake-freeze; public audit trigger

clauses.title: Immutable Rights
clauses.text: Basic rights (privacy, freedom-to-access-emergency) cannot be suspended except via PLANCK-level consensus.

enforcement.remedy: audit-only; emergency logs recorded at FEMTO & ZEPTO

clauses.title: Energy-Backed Validity
clauses.text: Any system-level governance action including validator rotation, constitutional amendment proposals, and planetary transfers must include an energy-escrow attestation equivalent to defined EnergyUnits.
